history.p: Studie efter Naturen belongs to the relatively small group of Nielsen's through-composed art songs. It was probably written in the first half of 1916 and is mentioned in a letter from July.

event.desc: Musikforeningen for Nykøbing F. og Omegn.

event.geogName: The Royal Danish Academy of Music (Det Kongelige Danske Musikkonservatorium)

relation.label: Arrangement not by Nielsen: See Appendix

titlePage.label: Title page
titlePage.p: CARL NIELSEN / Studie efter Naturen / TEKST AF H.C. ANDERSEN / Forlæggerens Ejendom for alle Lande / KJØBENHAVN & LEIPZIG. / WILHELM HANSEN, MUSIKFORLAG. / KRISTIANIA. NORSK MUSIK-FORLAG. / Brødrene Hals – Warmuth – Wilhelm Hansen. / STOCKHOLM / A.B. NORDISKA MUSIKFÖRLAGET / Scholander-Wilhelm Hansen / Copyright 1916 by Wilhelm Hansen, Leipzig.
